${modID}:PowerID.NAME: Ultimate Power
DESCRIPTIONS: You are Very Cool and Strong.

${modID}:TaiChi.NAME: Tai Chi
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play an #yAttack, gain #b%d #yBlock. Whenever you play a non-attack card, deal #b%d damage to a random enemy.

${modID}:Splash.NAME: Splash
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you deal #yAttack damage, deal #b%d%% of that damage to all other enemies.

${modID}:Ramp.NAME: Ramp
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain #b%d [E].

${modID}:LossAndOverflow.NAME: Loss and Overflow
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, after you draw, gain Strength equal to #b%1$d minus the total cost of cards in your hand (X is capped at #b%1$d).

${modID}:ChaosOrb.NAME: Chaos Orb
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play an Attack, apply a random debuff to the target enemy.
Whenever you play an Attack, apply #b%d random debuffs to the target enemy.
